channel.title: Please help asap ::SAS::S:S:
channel.description:
okay i have gotten my server up and running now.
but my clien is like right under 60mb
and it takes like 50 minutes for most peoples :S
how can i make the client smaller ?:S
cause i tryed to just have the run.bat but they got message something missing gui.
so i made one with run.bat and gui, but it still said something about gui.
please help :S

item.title: Please help asap ::SAS::S:S:
item.dc:creator: @pasta186 pasta186
item.description:
@pasta186 wrote:

#Haste:

Dude… Removing models, wouldn’t make a huge different

Haha,yes it would!
I put some models in,and i added on like 10mb!

Read full topic

item.title: Please help asap ::SAS::S:S:
item.dc:creator: @_Haste1 #Haste
item.description:
@_Haste1 wrote:

Right click the client folder, and click “Add to archive” And then put it to “.zip” and then the tab under it that gives you the option of…

Best, good, fast, etc.

Change it to “Best”

Dude… Removing models, wouldn’t make a huge different

Read full topic

item.title: Please help asap ::SAS::S:S:
item.dc:creator: @pasta186 pasta186
item.description:
@pasta186 wrote:

Hm,maybe take out some models(customs?)
If your client has music,delete the music and let the players put it in themselves.

Read full topic
